content.text: Hi there! My name is (name). I'm taking college courses on philosophy and history. I also write short stories in my document tab with the use of a prompting app. I ride my bike to class since it's only a mile away. My glasses are held together by tiger printed duct tape. My newly bought laptop has a bum battery.

Hi there! My name is (name). I started a new job this year, which is helping me learn more about socialization. I take everything literally. I am very genuine, and don't like small talk. I have a very good memory.
It's nice to meet you, (name). What's your favorite thing about your new job?
I like that I'm learning more about socialization. I've always been a bit of an introvert, so this is a good opportunity for me to step outside of my comfort zone.
That's great! I'm glad you're getting out of your comfort zone. I'm an introvert too, so I know how hard that can be.
Yeah, it can be tough, but it's also rewarding. I'm learning a lot about myself and how to interact with other people.
That's great to hear! I'm sure you'll be a great socializer in no time.
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. I love the characters and the story. It's a classic for a reason.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out sometime.
I highly recommend it. It's a great read.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
